actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Bingaman with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 107-279.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 598.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of establishing the Lower Los Angeles River and San Gabriel River watersheds in the State of California as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
short_title: San Gabriel River Watersheds Study Act of 2002

summary.text: San Gabriel River Watersheds Study Act of 2002 - Requires the Secretary of the Interior to study and report to specified congressional committees on the suitability and feasibility of establishing as a National Park System unit the watershed defined to include: (1) the San Gabriel River and its tributaries in Los Angeles and Orange Counties, California and (2) the San Gabriel Mountains within the territory of the San Gabriel and Lower Los Angeles Rivers and Mountains Conservancy.

titles.title: Lower Los Angeles River and San Gabriel River Watersheds Study Act of 2001
San Gabriel River Watersheds Study Act of 2002

A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of establishing the Lower Los Angeles River and San Gabriel River watersheds in the State of California as a unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.
